attributes.action: Legalise the use of Medicinal Cannabis in Scotland
attributes.additional_details: There is lots of information about the benefits of Medicinal Cannabis also recreational Cannabis all positive . the Goverments disinformation on cannabis is an opinion not scientific evidence.
attributes.background: To Legalise the use of Medicinal Cannabis in Scotland . allowing new evidence to be heard from the USA Israel and Portugal etc also the real recommendation from the ACMD report
